bibl.title: Hāritāmrapītāmbara’s Gāthāsaptaśatīprakāśikā, A Hitherto Unpublished Commentary on Hāla’s Gāthāsaptaśatī (IV–VII Śatakas)
bibl.note: Reprinted from the Oriental College Magazine, Vol. 18, No. 68, February, 1942.

div.p: ratisamaye apahṛtavasanāḥ kulastriyo rativirāme sati lajjāvaśāt priyāliṅganena jaghanadeśam āvṛṇvantīti tat kurvatīṃ dṛṣṭvā tattvajñaikā 'parasyāḥ kathayanti—raïvirameti | yato 'prāptavastrā itīva sahasā jaghanam āvṛṇvanti | ‘paścānnitambaḥ śtrīkaṭyāḥ klībe tu jaghanaṃ puraḥ’ ity amaraḥII. 6. 74 | patyur apekṣitācaraṇaṃ strīṇāṃ vratam iti dharmaḥ | nipuṇā upāyenaupamā yena kāryasaṃvaraṇam ācarantīti nītiḥ | virāme virasā viṣayā iti nītiḥThis must be a mistake for yuktiḥ. | tasyaiva || 461 ||

bahuvighnaśaṅkayā ṣaṣṭhaśatopakrame tadvāraṇāya bhagavato maheśvarasya stutimukhena namaskāragāthām āha—raïkelīti | nivasanaṃ vastram |
nayanayugakapolaṃ dantavāso mukhāntaḥ
stanahṛdayalalāṭaṃ cumbanasthānam āhuḥ |
iti | nagnastrīdarśanaṃ niṣiddhaṃ tannācaraṇīyaṃ | tad uktam—
araṃ bhuṅkte ciraṃ snāti dattaṃ puṣpaṃ na jighrati |
na paśyati striyaṃ nagnāṃ matpriyās tena sādhavaḥ ||
iti dharmaḥ || utpannamatayaḥ kadāpi nāvasīdantīti nītiḥ | kvāpy avarodhaḥ kvāpi tadviraha iti saṃsārāvasthāṃ vimṛśya sadbhir udāstavyam iti yuktiḥ | śālavāhanasya || 501 ||

lg.l: aliaṃ cia phurioṭṭhaṃ vialiamaṃtaṃ haraṃ ṇamaha || 697 ||

div.p: alīkaroṣodgamo devānām api bhavati kiṃ punar mānuṣasyeti praṇayaroṣam asahamānaṃ kam api yuvānaṃ kāpi sakalakāmakalābhijñā pratiṣṭhitā bahutarānunayanaprakāraṃ bodhayanty āha | granthānte namaskāragāthāṃ vā prāha—saṃjhe | hareṇaiva prakaraṇāt sandhyopāsanārthaṃ gṛhīto yo jalāñjalis tatra pratimayā saṅkrāntaṃ gaurīmukhakamalaṃ yasmāt taṃ haram | anarthakaṃ vṛthaiva yathā syād evaṃ sphurita oṣṭho yasya taṃ haraṃ namateti sambandhaḥ | pasuvaïṇo ity ādigāthāyām evārthatrayam aparam uktaṃ veditavyam || 697 ||
